query.name: org.bucksiu.powershellpowerschool.api.students
query.sql:
select s.id, s.dcid, s.City, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'Comp_Info_Accep_Policy') Comp_Info_Accep_Policy, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'CT_Area') CT_Area, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'District_ID') District_ID, s.DOB, s.first_name, s.last_name, s.gender, s.grade_level, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'Horizon_LunchID') Horizon_LunchID, s.Student_Number, s.enroll_status, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'Emerg_3_Phone') Emerg_3_Phone, s.Emerg_Phone_1, s.Emerg_Phone_2, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'Mother_Cell_Phone') Mother_Cell_Phone, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'Father_Cell_Phone') Father_Cell_Phone, s.Home_Phone, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'AMPM') AMPM, s.mother, s.father, s.Mailing_Street, s.Street, s.Mailing_City, s.Mailing_State, s.Mailing_Zip, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'motherdayphone') motherdayphone, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'fatherdayphone') fatherdayphone, s.GuardianEmail, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'PA_Partic_Program') PA_Partic_Program, s.DistrictOfResidence, s.Middle_Name
from students s order by s.dcid
